WRITING.TITLE: [XBOX] Questions about beams
WRITING.TEXT:
I'm currently on lvl 52 tac captain in a cruiser. Starting to think about how to best utilize my ship T5U Avenger to play into the end until a T6 I like comes out. Reading through here and on the stobuild reddit, I think I'm going to mainly rely on beams for damage (maybe a torp upfront for the sake of canon)
I was wondering if the type of beam really matters that much? I have been seeing the AntiProtons seen to be the way to go, but I really like the way Tetryon and Polaron weapons look.
I know that sticking to one type of beam is best due to consoles, but is there a particular reason why one beam type is hands down better than the rest?
Also with the smaller arc angles on the dual beam is it worth it to include into my build? This whole thing stems from a budget build I saw using only tetryon beams.

I have seen multiple people post about not leveling enough. I'm just almost done with the both arc and an at 52 I don't see how I'm not even close to delta quadrant arc yet higher level than those that are.
It looks like more of an issue on PS4 than xbox from what I have noticed
Ah I see.
Took me a while to catch on to that, I thought I was going crazy... Well more crazy than I am.

That's what I've been doing for the EC.
